FuncDef: This command specifies the average frame size used in the calculation of the fixed and variable encapsulation offset when theencap-offsetcommand is enabled in the egress context of a subscriber profile.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the average frame size value to be used in the adjustment of the subscriber aggregate rate to account for the per packet variable expansion of the last mile for the specific session used by the subscriber host. Values-64 to 4096.
